Posts.Content: keishi33 wrote: I am a 34 year old mother of 2 young children (6 &3) and I am facing my third go around with triple negative cancer since 10/07.  So far I have held up pretty well because the first recurance was in one area and I felt it was still "beatable".  This time is much harder as it is now in my bones and 5 other areas.  My DRs are suggesting a research study (SCH 727965) to try another way at this thing.  I have to make my decision by Monday as I will start something next week.  Is anyone familar with this trial?  I want to be as aggressive as I can but I don't want to try something that has little hope of working and when there are other triditional chemos that may be better. Though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death I will fear no evil. Dx 10/19/2007, IDC, 0/3 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Clinical Trial Drug SCH 727965 keishi33 keishi33
